org.apache.giraph.utils

类 ByteArrayVertexIdMessages<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.ByteArrayVertexIdData<I,M>
      • org.apache.giraph.utils.ByteArrayVertexIdMessages<I,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class ByteArrayVertexIdMessages<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends ByteArrayVertexIdData<I,M>
    Stores vertex id and message pairs in a single byte array.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ByteArrayVertexIdMessages.VertexIdMessageBytesIterator
      Special iterator that reuses vertex ids and messages bytes so that the lifetime of the object is only until next() is called.
      class  ByteArrayVertexIdMessages.VertexIdMessageIterator
      Special iterator that reuses vertex ids and message objects so that the lifetime of the object is only until next() is called.

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.giraph.utils.ByteArrayVertexIdData

        ByteArrayVertexIdData.VertexIdDataIterator

      • getVertexIdMessageIterator

        public ByteArrayVertexIdMessages.VertexIdMessageIterator getVertexIdMessageIterator()
        Get specialized iterator that will instiantiate the vertex id and message of this object.
        返回:
        Special iterator that reuses vertex ids and messages unless specified

      • getVertexIdMessageBytesIterator

        public ByteArrayVertexIdMessages.VertexIdMessageBytesIterator getVertexIdMessageBytesIterator()
        Get specialized iterator that will instiantiate the vertex id and message of this object. It will only produce message bytes, not actual messages and expects a different encoding.
        返回:
        Special iterator that reuses vertex ids (unless released) and copies message bytes
